mutants.code:
def calculate_minimum_travel_time(k, distances, supplies):
    n = len(distances)
    time = sum(distances)
    fuel = 1
    best = 0
    for i in range(n):
        assert fuel >= 0
        fuel += supplies[i] - distances[i]
        if supplies[i] > supplies[best]:
            best = i
        if fuel < 0:
            need = -fuel
            count = need // supplies[best]
            if need % supplies[best] != 0:
                count += 1
            time += count * k
            fuel += supplies[best] * count
    return time
